attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I cannot believe this. It hacked into my contacts and texted everyone I know. I would not recommend that ANYONE trust this app.

attributes.title: racist sexual predator?!?!
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to see what trump was up to and to stay up to date on his campaign but upon finding out he’s a racist sexual predator i don’t wish to be associated with this man in anyway. as far as the app itself it did decent till it started crashing randomly overall i give this a one star✨

attributes.title: Terrible app from a terrible person
attributes.review: This app accurately reflects the campaign if the campaign if the worst person in Us history. Supporting Trump via this app supports murder, bigotry and hate.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Worst app ever! it took forever to download and when it did my phone would shutdown and my headphones stopped working...whyyyy?!!?! DONT NOT GET THIS APP! absolute garbage just like the president of the united states 🤢🤢🤢
If I could give you this app a zero I would it’s literally a scam I can’t even think about it, apple plz delete this app!!

attributes.title: Bad bad trump
attributes.review: A lot of things shouldn’t be executed or presented how you show them and I truly believe you are bias to your color of skin and that’s wrong

attributes.title: Bad

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I was exited to get to get this app and be informed, but after a while everything stopped working. Don’t get it!!

attributes.title: i wanted to learn more about trump
attributes.review: today i got this app, and it took a whole day to download! it took up so so so much of my battery percentage and i just wanted to learn more about this cheeto we call our “beloved president”. i definitely do not recommend downloading this as it crashed my ipad multiple times. 💫✨⭐️🌟⚡️👁👄👁
